actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: To provide for the issuance of visa numbers to certain former political prisoners in the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
short_title: Vietnamese Reeducation Prisoner Resettlement Act of 1989

summary.text: Vietnamese Reeducation Prisoner Resettlement Act of 1989 - Authorizes the issuance of immigrant visas to former prisoners held in reeducation camps in the Socialist Republic of Vietnam and members of their families. Makes such persons eligible for specified refugee benefits. Requires the Attorney General to make three annual program reports to the Congress.

titles.title: Vietnamese Reeducation Prisoner Resettlement Act of 1989
To provide for the issuance of visa numbers to certain former political prisoners in the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
